items.title: 为什么Apple TV在隐私保护方面优于Roku和Fire TV (原标题: Why Apple TV Beats Roku and Fire TV for Privacy Protection)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
## Apple TV在隐私保护方面优于竞争对手

根据ArsTechnica的全面分析，Apple TV在隐私保护方面远优于竞争对手的流媒体硬件，为用户提供了一个难得的避风港，使其免受大多数智能电视体验中普遍存在的跟踪。

### 主要优势：

*   **无自动内容识别（ACR）：** Apple TV设备不包含ACR软件。ACR是一种侵入性跟踪技术，用于监控几乎所有智能电视和流媒体设备上的观看习惯。这使得Apple TV立即获得了隐私优势，优于Roku、Amazon Fire TV以及内置智能电视平台。
*   **易于访问的隐私控制：** 在设置过程中，Apple TV用户可以轻松禁用Siri、位置跟踪以及与Apple共享分析数据。相比之下，大多数竞争设备将这些隐私控制深埋在设置菜单中，用户难以找到和调整。
*   **商业模式：** Apple的主要商业模式不依赖于销售定向广告。tvOS操作系统没有集成广告，不像Roku OS和LG的webOS那样在主屏幕和屏保上显示广告。
*   **应用跟踪透明度（ATT）：** 运行tvOS 14.5及更高版本的Apple TV要求第三方应用在跟踪用户之前请求许可，尽管此设置默认未启用。

### Apple生态系统内的隐私考量：

*   **Apple TV应用数据收集：** Apple的TV应用会收集观看习惯、购买和搜索查询数据，以改进推荐和Apple服务。这些信息可能用于News和App Store等其他Apple应用中的个性化广告，但用户可以通过设备设置禁用这些功能。
*   **Siri语音请求：** Siri语音请求会自动发送到Apple服务器。Apple承诺不将此数据用于营销档案，但报告指出，Apple在1月份同意支付9500万美元，以解决一起关于Siri隐私侵犯的集体诉讼。

### 总结与建议：

尽管Apple面临更积极地将其流媒体服务货币化的压力，但ArsTechnica的全面分析表明，Apple TV仍然是注重隐私的流媒体用户的首选推荐。对于寻求最大隐私的用户，报告建议在不使用Apple账户的情况下使用Apple机顶盒，并禁用所有跟踪功能，避免使用Siri或Apple TV应用。

![Apple TV 4K hero 221018 feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/eLI4CjNILrUo4mGwR1PEyMX65lg=/400x0/article-new/2023/10/Apple-TV-4K-hero-221018-feature.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: ArsTechnica分析显示，Apple TV在隐私保护方面优于Roku和Fire TV。其主要优势在于不包含侵入性的自动内容识别（ACR）软件，提供易于访问的隐私控制，且商业模式不依赖于广告。尽管Apple TV应用和Siri会收集部分用户数据（可禁用），但Apple TV仍是注重隐私的流媒体用户的最佳选择。
items.translated_title: 为什么Apple TV在隐私保护方面优于Roku和Fire TV
items.content:
The Apple TV is much more private than competing streaming hardware, offering users a rare refuge from the pervasive tracking that defines most smart TV experiences, according to a comprehensive analysis by ArsTechnica.


The main difference is said to be Apple's approach to automatic content recognition (ACR), the invasive tracking technology that monitors viewing habits on nearly every smart TV and streaming device. Apple TV devices don't include ACR software, and that gives them an immediate privacy advantage over alternatives like Roku, Amazon Fire TV, and built-in, smart TV platforms.

The report also notes that during setup, Apple TV users can easily disable Siri, location tracking, and analytics sharing with Apple. In contrast, most competing devices bury these privacy controls deep in settings menus, making them difficult for average users to find and adjust.

Apple's business model also works in users' favor, since the company's primary business model isn't dependent on selling targeted ads. The tvOS operating system doesn't have integrated advertising, unlike Roku OS and LG's webOS, which display ads on home screens and screensavers. Apple TVs running tvOS 14.5 and later also require third-party apps to request permission before tracking users, although this setting isn't enabled by default.

Having said all that, the report points out some privacy considerations within Apple's own ecosystem. Apple's TV app collects data about viewing habits, purchases, and search queries to improve recommendations and Apple's services. This information can be used for personalized ads in other Apple apps like News and the App Store, but users can disable these features through device settings.

Siri voice requests are also automatically sent to Apple's servers. Apple promises not to use this data for marketing profiles, but the report notes that Apple agreed to pay $95 million in January to settle a class-action lawsuit over Siri privacy violations.

Despite the pressure Apple is facing to monetize its streaming services more aggressively, ArsTechnica's thorough analysis suggests the Apple TV remains the go-to recommendation for privacy-conscious streamers. For users seeking maximum privacy, the report recommends using Apple's set-top box without an Apple account, as well as disabling all tracking features and avoiding using Siri or the Apple TV app.
Tags: Apple Privacy, Privacy

items.title: Instagram 有望于今年晚些时候发布 iPad 应用 (原标题: Instagram Expected to Release iPad App Later This Year)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## Instagram iPad 应用即将发布

根据多方消息，Meta 正在积极开发备受期待的 iPad 版 Instagram 应用，并有望于今年晚些时候发布。

### 主要进展

*   **消息来源证实**：
    *   《The Information》的 Kaya Yurieff 和 Kalley Huang 早在四月份就报道了 Meta 正在开发 iPad 版 Instagram 应用。
    *   彭博社的 Mark Gurman 在其《Power On》时事通讯中证实了这一报道，并指出 Meta 员工正在“积极测试”该应用。
*   **发布预期**：Mark Gurman 预计，除非出现任何挫折，该应用将在今年内发布。

### Meta 对 iPad 应用策略的转变

*   **历史态度**：自 2011 年起，Meta 就为 iPad 提供了 Facebook 应用，但长期以来一直避免为该设备提供其他应用。
*   **近期转变**：
    *   Meta 的这一策略似乎正在改变。上周，该公司发布了 iPad 版 WhatsApp 应用。
    *   现在，多方消息来源均声称 iPad 版 Instagram 应用也在开发中。
*   **Threads 应用**：目前尚无关于 Meta 是否计划发布 iPad 版 Threads 应用的消息。

![Instagram Feature 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MU49mkqkTLsK9y7h4wGO2nj5RQQ=/400x0/article-new/2021/03/Instagram-Feature-2.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Meta 正在积极测试 iPad 版 Instagram 应用，预计将于今年晚些时候发布。这一举动标志着 Meta 对 iPad 应用策略的转变，此前该公司已于上周发布了 iPad 版 WhatsApp。多方消息证实了 Instagram 应用的开发，但目前尚无关于 Threads iPad 应用的消息。
items.translated_title: Instagram 有望于今年晚些时候发布 iPad 应用
items.content:
The Information's Kaya Yurieff and Kalley Huang in April reported that Meta was working on a long-awaited Instagram app for iPads.


Bloomberg's Mark Gurman corroborated the report in his Power On newsletter today.

Gurman said that Meta employees are "actively testing" Instagram for the iPad, and he expects the app to be released this year, barring any setbacks.

Meta has offered a Facebook app for iPads since 2011, but it had largely avoided offering apps for the device otherwise. That tune finally seems to be changing, as the company released a WhatsApp app for iPads last week, and there are now multiple sources who have claimed that an Instagram app for iPads is in the pipeline too.

There is no word yet on whether Meta plans to release an iPad app for Threads as well.
Tags: Instagram, Mark Gurman

items.title: WWDC 2025 可能比过去两届规模“更小”，原因如下 (原标题: WWDC 2025 Likely 'Smaller-Scale' Than Past Two WWDCs, Here's Why)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# WWDC 2025 展望：规模可能“更小”

根据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的说法，有迹象表明 2025 年的 WWDC（全球开发者大会）将比 2023 年和 2024 年的规模“更小”。

![WWDC 2025 Banner](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1aKA6EyuhJnYU5ixM84PAGl_SGg=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/WWDC-2025-Banner.jpg?lossy)

## 往届 WWDC 的重大发布

*   **WWDC 2023：** 苹果发布了 Vision Pro 头显及其 visionOS 操作系统。尽管 Vision Pro 因高昂的起售价（3,499 美元）导致销量不佳，但这仍是一项备受期待的重大产品发布。
*   **WWDC 2024：** 苹果推出了 Apple Intelligence，以回应 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 和 Google 的 Gemini 等生成式 AI 平台的日益普及。

## WWDC 2025 规模缩小的原因

古尔曼表示，WWDC 2025 不太可能出现同等规模的重大新硬件或软件发布。

*   **硬件方面：** “没有重大的新设备准备发货。”
*   **AI 方面：**
    *   一些苹果员工认为，从 AI 角度来看，WWDC 2025 可能会“令人失望”。
    *   古尔曼指出，苹果在展示其追赶领先生成式 AI 公司（包括 OpenAI 和 Google）的进展方面“不会有太多作为”，苹果的不足可能变得“更加明显”。

## 2025 年 WWDC 的预期亮点

尽管缺乏重大硬件或 AI 突破，古尔曼仍预计会有一些值得关注的更新：

*   **次要软件更新：**
    *   预计将提供 Swift Assist 的更新。
    *   SwiftUI 将获得一个富文本编辑器。
*   **主要软件平台重新设计：**
    *   苹果重新设计的软件平台预计将令许多粉丝感到兴奋。
    *   iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS 26、tvOS 26 和 watchOS 26 都将采用受 visionOS 启发的全新玻璃般设计，用户界面元素（如菜单、按钮和图标）将更具半透明效果。
    *   古尔曼写道：“更新的用户界面无疑将是亮点公告，即使这可能传递出苹果墨守成规的信息。”

## 用户反响的主观性

WWDC 2025 在苹果粉丝心中的地位将是主观的：

*   一些人可能会发现重新设计的软件平台比 Vision Pro 和 Apple Intelligence 更具吸引力。
*   然而，对于另一些人来说，苹果未能在生成式 AI 方面取得有意义的进展可能会带来巨大的失望。

## 展望未来：2026 年的 AI 推动

好消息是，苹果预计将在 2026 年加大对 AI 的投入，公司仍在努力开发：

*   类似 ChatGPT 的对话式 Siri 版本。
*   由 Apple Intelligence 驱动的改进版“快捷指令”应用。
items.shortSummary: WWDC 2025 预计规模将小于前两年，主要因缺乏重大新硬件发布和在生成式 AI 方面的进展有限。彭博社的马克·古尔曼指出，尽管 AI 方面可能令人失望，但 iOS 26 等主要软件平台将迎来受 visionOS 启发的全新半透明设计，这将是本次大会的亮点。苹果计划在 2026 年加大 AI 投入，包括开发类似 ChatGPT 的 Siri。
items.translated_title: WWDC 2025 可能比过去两届规模“更小”，原因如下
items.content:
There are signs that WWDC will be "smaller-scale" this year than it was in 2023 and 2024, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


At WWDC 2023, Apple unveiled the Vision Pro, along with its visionOS operating system. While the headset has faced low sales, due in part to its high $3,499 starting price, this was still a major and highly-anticipated product announcement.

Apple Intelligence debuted at WWDC 2024, in response to the surging popularity of generative AI platforms like OpenAI's ChatGPT and Google's Gemini.

At WWDC 2025, however, Gurman said it is unlikely that there will be any major new hardware or software announcements of that scale.

"There are no major new devices ready to ship," he said, in his Power On newsletter today.

In addition, some Apple employees believe that WWDC 2025 may be a "letdown" from an AI standpoint, according to Gurman. He said that Apple "will do little" to show that it is catching up to leading companies in the generative AI space, including OpenAI and Google, and Apple's shortcomings could become "even more obvious."

Gurman does expect Apple to provide an update on Swift Assist at WWDC 2025, and he said that SwiftUI will get a rich text editor.

On the other hand, Gurman believes that Apple's redesigned software platforms should be exciting for many Apple fans. iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26, tvOS 26, and watchOS 26 are all rumored to have a new visionOS-inspired, glass-like design with more translucent user interface elements, such as menus, buttons, and icons.

"The updated user interface will certainly be the standout announcement, even if it risks sending the message that Apple is stuck in the past," wrote Gurman.

Ultimately, where WWDC 2025 will rank in Apple fans' minds is subjective, as some might find redesigned software platforms to be even more interesting than the Vision Pro and Apple Intelligence. For others, though, Apple failing to make meaningful progress on the generative AI front might be an overshadowing disappointment.

The good news is that Apple is expected to make a bigger push into AI heading into 2026, with the company still working on a conversational ChatGPT-like version of Siri, a revamped Shortcuts app powered by Apple Intelligence, and more.
Related Roundup: WWDC 2025
Tag: Mark Gurman

items.title: macOS Tahoe 名称在苹果下周 WWDC 活动前泄露 (原标题: macOS Tahoe Name Leaked Ahead of Apple's WWDC Event Next Week)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
### macOS 26 名称泄露

*   据彭博社的 Mark Gurman 在其《Power On》时事通讯中透露，macOS 26 的名称将是 **macOS Tahoe**。
*   该名称取自加利福尼亚州风景优美的太浩湖（Lake Tahoe）。
*   苹果公司此前曾以大型猫科动物命名其 Mac 操作系统（如 Cheetah、Tiger、Leopard、Lion），但从 2013 年的 OS X Mavericks 开始，转为使用加州地标名称（如 Yosemite、Monterey、Sonoma、Sequoia）。

### 设计理念

*   太浩湖以其反射性水面而闻名，能映照周围的山脉和天空。
*   Gurman 表示，这与 macOS 26 传闻中的玻璃般设计相符，该设计将拥有更半透明的窗口、按钮和图标。

### 发布时间

*   苹果预计将在 WWDC 2025 主题演讲中发布 macOS 26，该演讲定于太平洋时间 6 月 9 日（星期一）上午 10 点开始。

### 操作系统版本号变更

*   据报道，苹果计划对其所有操作系统进行重新命名，未来将以年份而非版本号来标识。
*   这意味着 iOS、iPadOS、watchOS、tvOS 和 visionOS 也将统一被命名为“26”，例如 iOS 26，而不是 iOS 19。

### 相关图片

*   macOS Tahoe 渲染图：
    ![macOS Tahoe Render](https://images.macrumors.com/t/eCl0QKwfAuMcM_TcqkvAmL_eLzM=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/macOS-Tahoe-Render.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 彭博社的 Mark Gurman 透露，macOS 26 将命名为 macOS Tahoe，取自加州太浩湖。新系统预计采用玻璃般半透明设计，与太浩湖的反射特性相呼应。苹果计划在 WWDC 2025 上发布 macOS 26，并将其所有操作系统（如 iOS、iPadOS 等）的版本号统一更改为“26”，以年份命名。
items.translated_title: macOS Tahoe 名称在苹果下周 WWDC 活动前泄露
items.content:
The alleged name of macOS 26 (yes) has leaked.


In his Power On newsletter today, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said that macOS 26 will be named macOS Tahoe, after California's scenic Lake Tahoe.

Apple previously named its Mac operating systems after big cats like Cheetah, Tiger, Leopard, and Lion. Starting with OS X Mavericks in 2013, however, Apple switched to California-themed names like Yosemite, Monterey, Sonoma, and Sequoia.

Lake Tahoe is known for its reflective waters, which mirror the surrounding landscape, including mountains and the sky. Gurman said that would align with macOS 26's rumored glass-like design with more translucent windows, buttons, and icons.

Apple is expected to unveil macOS 26 alongside iOS 26, iPadOS 26, watchOS 26, tvOS 26, and visionOS 26 during its WWDC 2025 keynote, which is set to begin on Monday, June 9 at 10 a.m. Pacific Time. The conference is just eight days away.

# Sonos父亲节促销：家庭音频设备大额折扣
